# groupingLevel

**Instance Property**

The number of nested undo groups (or redo groups, if redo is the most recent operation) in the current event loop.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var groupingLevel: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

An integer indicating the number of nested groups. If 0 is returned, there is no open undo or redo group.

## Related Documentation

- **levelsOfUndo**: The maximum number of top-level undo groups the undo manager holds.

## Creating undo groups

- **beginUndoGrouping()**: Marks the beginning of an undo group.
- **endUndoGrouping()**: Marks the end of an undo group.
- **groupsByEvent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the manager automatically creates undo groups around each pass of the run loop.
